actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish a national usury law.

summary.text: National Usury Law - Limits, to seven percent, the interest charge in connection with any credit or loan transaction entered into on or after December 31, 1980. Sets forth a schedule by which the maximum allowable interest charge shall be reduced from ten percent in six month steps by one-half percent per step.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national usury law.
